statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: Give you the width and height of the rectangle,darw it.

statement.title: Input
statement.content: Input contains a number of test cases.For each case ,there are two numbers n and m (0 < n,m < 75)indicate the width and height of the rectangle.Iuput ends of EOF.

statement.title: Output
statement.content:
For each case,you should draw a rectangle with the width and height giving in the input.
after each case, you should a blank line.
